title: [Control Systems] Moxa security advisory (AV26-094)
description: On February 6, 2026, Moxa published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: UC Series  version OS image (MIL v3.4.1) and prior
V Series  version OS image (MIL3) and prior
V2406C Series  version OS image (MIL2) and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
